articles.headline: Scandal at Siemens Tarnishes Promising Results
articles.snippet: Siemens has reported buoyant financial results but is immersed in a fast-expanding corruption scandal that threatens to torpedo its reputation.
articles.abstract: Siemens has reported buoyant financial results but is immersed in a fast-expanding corruption scandal that threatens to torpedo its reputation.
articles.lead_paragraph: MUNICH, Feb. 27 — Klaus Kleinfeld’s office here is dominated by a photograph of a storm-tossed sea off Iceland. Mr. Kleinfeld relishes the churning image, he said, though as counterpoint, he has hung a soothing watercolor with pink blossoms on another wall.
articles.byline: By Mark Landler and Carter Dougherty

articles.headline: Wall St. Tumble Adds to Worries About Economies
articles.snippet: Stock markets around the world plummeted Tuesday in a wave of selling set off by a plunge in China.
articles.abstract: Stock markets around the world plummeted Tuesday in a wave of selling set off by a plunge in China.
articles.lead_paragraph: Stock markets around the world plummeted yesterday in a wave of selling set off by a plunge in China that was reinforced by worries of weakening economies. The falling prices continued in early Asian trading today, but by midday the Chinese market seemed to be stabilizing.
articles.byline: By Floyd Norris and Jeremy W. Peters

articles.headline: From Shanghai, Tremors Heard Around the World
articles.snippet: To many investors and analysts, the massive sell-off Tuesday was just the latest indication that share prices in China have been defying expectations.

articles.lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI, Feb. 27 — In China’s wild cowboy stock market, record-breaking run-ups have been followed by mini-crashes that have been largely confined within this country’s borders.

articles.lead_paragraph: To a rice farmer from Thailand making $500 a year, the recruiter’s pitch was hard to resist — three years of farm work in North Carolina that would pay more than 30 times as much as he earned at home.
